name: Reptar Mask (Used)
description: Smells like raw plastic and regret. Breathing while wearing it triggers VHS distortion nearby.

name: Courage's Collar (Bloodstained)
description: Causes wearer to hear faint screams from the attic when alone.

name: Teeth Candle
description: Made of wax and molars. Weeps during thunderstorms.

name: Jawbox Plush
description: Its jaw occasionally snaps shut when you're not looking.

name: Plank of Dread (Possessed)
description: An abandoned wooden plank found behind an old Courage-era property. Its carved face glows faintly with alchemical lines.
disclosure: WARNING: This item may cause hallucinations, device screen flickering, or memory loops. BYTEBUNNY is not responsible for hauntings.

name: McNasty Deluxe (Forgotten Commercial Prop)
description: A burger used in a banned Nickelodian promo reel in 2002. The lettuce moves when you stare too long. Thought to have been a crossover gag â€” until the ad was wiped from archives.
disclosure: Smell may leak through the screen. Flashbacks reported. Do not microwave under any circumstance.
